entry.title: Bimodal IT: Let the backlash begin

WTF is... oh there's no such... but it works, right?

Gartner defines Bimodal IT as: â€œthe practice of managing two separate, coherent modes of IT delivery, one focused on stability and the other on agility. Mode 1 is traditional and sequential, emphasizing safety and accuracy. Mode 2 is exploratory and nonlinear, emphasizing agility and speedâ€.â€¦
